name: Pirate Penguins VS Polar Bears on JetSki
name_original: Pirate Penguins VS Polar Bears on JetSki
description:
PEWWW PEWWW PEWWW PEWWW!!!!

Your a Pirate Penguin (Ship)... and you have to fight all these evil Polar Bears ( riding JetSkis ) ... and Ice Bergs .... don't underestimate those damn Ice Bergs!!!
